nodes.text: Jango Fett: Bounty Hunter is Star Wars Legends young readers book written by Eric Arnold and illustrated by Valerie Reckert. The book is part of the Jedi Readers series, and it was published by LucasBooks on April 23, 2002. Set before and concurrently to the events of Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, Jango Fett: Bounty Hunter follows Jango Fett as he works for Count Dooku and hires Zam Wesell.
Boba Fett's father, Jango, accepts a dangerous mission as a bounty hunter.
